home.title: Enno Lohmann
home.subtitle: Fullstack Developer & Software Architect
home.description: I'm a passionate fullstack developer who loves crafting software solutions with Java and modern web frameworks. For over eight years, I've been helping clients across diverse industries turn their ideas into reality.
home.experienceText: Whether it's working with intimate three-developer teams or leading large-scale digital transformation projects with 120+ stakeholders, I thrive in collaborative environments where great ideas come to life through teamwork.
home.qualityText: I believe in delivering software that truly makes a difference. Through clean, maintainable code, thorough testing, and smart performance optimization, I ensure every project meets the highest standards.
home.journeyText1: My love for software development started over eight years ago, and it's been an incredible ride ever since. I've had the chance to work on everything from large-scale insurance platforms to cutting-edge case management systems for government agencies.
home.journeyText2: What really drives me is finding that sweet spot where technical excellence meets real human impact. Whether I'm building full-stack solutions with Java and Angular or designing cloud-native applications, I'm always thinking about the people who'll actually use what I create.
home.journeyText3: But here's what I've learned: the best software doesn't come from working in isolation. I love creating environments where knowledge flows freely—whether I'm mentoring junior developers or running cross-functional workshops. Great ideas come from bringing different perspectives together.
home.currentFocusText: Right now, I'm leading full-stack development on next-generation insurance platforms. It's exciting work that combines modern web technologies with robust backend systems to completely transform how customers experience insurance services.
home.philosophyText: Quality code isn't just about avoiding bugs—it's about building solutions that people can actually maintain, scale, and find genuinely useful. Every line of code should have a purpose and contribute to something bigger.
home.beyondCodeText: When I'm not building software, you'll find me exploring virtual worlds in my favorite games, training with my four-legged companions, or geeking out over the latest tech innovations.
home.gamingText: From strategic thinking in Age of Empires to conquering the challenging worlds of Dark Souls
home.dogTrainingText: Building strong bonds and clear communication with my four-legged companions
home.techInnovationText: Always exploring emerging technologies and discovering their real-world potential
home.exploreMoreText: Dive deeper into my professional journey, technical expertise, and the projects that have shaped who I am today.
home.technologiesCard: Explore my technical toolkit and see how I leverage modern development technologies
home.projectsCard: Discover the impactful software solutions I've built across diverse industries
home.hobbiesCard: Get to know the person behind the code through my personal passions
home.contactCard: Let's connect and explore how we can collaborate on your next project
